code: import axios from"axios";import{appConstants}from"../constants/constant";export var putUserInfo=function putUserInfo(ui){var putUserInfoPromise=axios.put("".concat(appConstants.API,"/user-details"),ui);return{type:appConstants.PUT_USER_INFO,payload:putUserInfoPromise};};export var getUserInfo=function getUserInfo(user_id){console.log(appConstants.API);var getUserInfoPromise=axios.get("".concat(appConstants.API,"/user-details/").concat(user_id));return{type:appConstants.GET_USER_INFO,payload:getUserInfoPromise};};
